    • Constructor Detail

      • ShopifyAPI

        public ShopifyAPI()
        Connects to Shopify Service. User provides properties via classpath file. shopify.properties

      • ShopifyAPI

        public ShopifyAPI(String api_key,
                  String password,
                  String shop_name)
        Connects to Shopify Service. User must provide credentials.
        Parameters:
        api_key - The api_key from Shopify
        password - The password given by Shopify
        shop_name - The name of the store you wish to connect.
